name: Aquatics
description: Swimming Pool is open. Entry to the pool will be done on membership basis.

name: Athletics
description: Promoting physical fitness and healthy competition through running, jumping, and throwing. Open to all skill levels from UG to PhD.

name: Badminton
description: Student-run group focused on regular training sessions, tournaments, and inter-college competitions like Inter IIT.

name: Basketball
description: Prominent club with active Girls and Boys teams. Welcomes beginners and encourages new talent.

name: Cricket
description: Professional level facilities and quality coaching to nourish talent. Participation in professional tournaments.

name: Chess
description: Focuses on strategic play and mastering objectives like checkmate and avoiding stalemate.

name: Football
description: Led by Harsh Wardhan and coached by Mr. Vishal Pillai. High participation across all student levels and faculty.

name: Tennis
description: Focuses on developing stamina, speed, agility, and the dynamic balance between body, ball, and racket.

name: Table Tennis
description: Inducts players based on exceptional talent and dedication. Offers friendly matches and professional coaching.

name: Volleyball
description: Develops competency in basic skills like forearm pass, overhead pass, attack, and game strategies.

name: Gym
description: Learn techniques for weight-loss, muscle building, and heart health to meet sports performance goals.

name: Yoga
description: Aims for physical health, mental hygiene, emotional stability, and higher levels of consciousness.
